comment.author: 59375758@N06
comment._content: Arthur Tannahill who died in 1945 (and was married to Isabella) arrived in 1908 and either worked for or owned Equator Sawmills.   He then worked for the Land Office in Nairobi.   In 1932 he became President of the Kenya Golfing Society.   He was awarded the OBE.   So it may be possible to gather further information on this particular photographer.

comment.author: 64555638@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/59375758@N06] I have an old photo album put together by Arthur Tannahill in 1929. Thanks for the info about him.
